fields.name: Mohgwyn's Spear build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear prioritizes maximizing its Fire damage, bleed buildup, and the potent Bloodboon Ritual skill. High Arcane is the most crucial scaling stat, as it significantly boosts both the weapon's overall damage and the speed of bleed application, making it easier to trigger the 20% attack boost from the Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman. The Shard of Alexander is essential for enhancing the damage of Bloodboon Ritual, which is a key offensive ability, and the Fire Scorpion Charm further amplifies the weapon's Fire damage. The White Mask provides a crucial attack bonus when bleed occurs, which will happen frequently, while high poise armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying Faith-based buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength using a seal like the Dragon Communion Seal), initiating Bloodboon Ritual to inflict bleed and activate buffs, then following up with regular attacks and skills to continuously deal damage and trigger bleed, potentially utilizing the Carian Filigreed Crest to reduce the FP cost of the skill for more frequent use. The Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Strength-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost Fire and Strength for maximum damage.

fields.name: Dual Mohgwyn's Spear build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Mohgwyn's Sacred Spears focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks, maximizing bleed buildup, and dealing massive damage. High Arcane investment remains paramount for both spears to ensure optimal damage and bleed application. The Claw Talisman is a key component, significantly boosting the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary offensive maneuver for initiating combat and dealing burst damage. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman is essential, providing a significant attack boost once bleed is inflicted, which will occur very quickly with two bleeding weapons, and the White Mask provides a further attack bonus when bleed is present nearby. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding strikes. High Endurance (35-40) is essential for managing the stamina drain from wielding two heavy weapons and wearing heavy armor. The Fire Scorpion Charm provides a final boost to the weapons' fire damage. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Bloodboon Ritual (boosted by the Shard of Alexander) to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously applying bleed. The Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Strength-Knot Crystal Tear further boost fire and strength for maximum damage.

fields.name: Mohgwyn's Spear & Reduvia build
fields.description: The Reduvia and Mohgwyn's Sacred Spears focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks, maximizing bleed buildup, and dealing massive damage. High Arcane investment remains paramount for one spear and reduvia daggers to ensure optimal damage and bleed application. The Claw Talisman is a key component, significantly boosting the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary offensive maneuver for initiating combat and dealing burst damage. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman is essential, providing a significant attack boost once bleed is inflicted, which will occur very quickly with two bleeding weapons, and the White Mask provides a further attack bonus when bleed is present nearby. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding strikes. High Endurance (35-40) is essential for managing the stamina drain from wielding one heavy weapon and wearing heavy armor. The Fire Scorpion Charm provides a final boost to the weapons' fire damage. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Bloodboon Ritual (boosted by the Shard of Alexander) to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously applying bleed. The Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Strength-Knot Crystal Tear further boost fire and strength for maximum damage.

fields.name: Siluria's Tree build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Siluria's Tree centers on maximizing its Holy damage and the powerful, ranged potential of its unique skill, Siluria's Woe. The weapon scales with Strength, Dexterity, and Faith, so high investment in Strength (at least 27 to wield, 54 when two-handing for Strength bonus) and Faith (at least 20, higher for damage) is crucial. The Shard of Alexander and Godfrey Icon talismans are essential for boosting the damage of Siluria's Woe, making its charged projectile attacks extremely potent from range. The Sacred Scorpion Charm further enhances Holy damage, and high poise armor like the Crucible Knight set or Lionel's provides the necessary defense and stability. Strategic gameplay involves applying Faith buffs (like Golden Vow using a Clawmark Seal), finding optimal range, charging Siluria's Woe to inflict massive holy damage, and following up with standard and charged attacks, using the Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to maximize Holy damage and Faith.

fields.name: Dual Siluria's Tree
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Siluria's Trees (or one paired with a similar Holy/Strength Great Spear) focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks and Holy damage. High Strength and Faith investment remains paramount for both weapons. The Claw Talisman is a key component, significantly boosting the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary offensive maneuver for initiating combat and dealing burst damage. The Sacred Scorpion Charm and Godfrey Icon talismans are vital for maximizing the Holy damage and charged attack/skill damage of both weapons. High Endurance (35-40) is essential for managing the stamina drain from wielding two heavy weapons and wearing heavy armor. The Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman offers crucial physical damage negation. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Siluria's Woe (boosted by the Shard of Alexander) to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing Holy damage. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith for maximum damage.

fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Siluria's Trees (or one paired with a similar Holy/Strength Great Spear) focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks and Holy damage. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith for maximum damage.

fields.name: Serpent-Hunter build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Serpent-Hunter focuses on leveraging its inherent Strength scaling, maximized by wielding it two-handed. The weapon has a B rating in Strength at base and an E in Dexterity. Infusing it with the Heavy affinity further improves its Strength scaling, According to YouTube. The Shard of Alexander is crucial for enhancing the weapon's unique skill, Great-Serpent Hunt, which can be surprisingly effective for its hyper armor and extended range, even outside of the boss fight it's designed for. The Axe Talisman enhances charged heavy attacks, a potent aspect of this weapon's moveset, According to YouTube. High poise armor (like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets) and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman provide the necessary defense and stability. This strategy involves applying buffs (like Flame, Grant Me Strength if Faith is incorporated into the build), engaging with standard and charged attacks, and strategically using Great-Serpent Hunt to stagger enemies, then following up with critical hits or more heavy attacks. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick are used to amplify poise damage and charged attacks, respectively.

fields.name: Dual Serpent-Hunter build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Serpent-Hunters focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks and maximizing damage output. High Strength investment remains paramount for both weapons, as the Serpent-Hunter scales well with this stat. The Claw Talisman is a key component, significantly boosting the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary offensive maneuver for initiating combat and dealing burst damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding strikes. The Spear Talisman is also valuable for enhancing counterattacks, taking advantage of the Serpent-Hunter's pierce damage type during trades. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing the stamina drain and equip load of two heavy weapons and armor. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Great-Serpent Hunt (boosted by the Shard of Alexander) to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while maintaining high damage output. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Serpent-Hunters focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks and maximizing damage output. fields.name: Vyke's War Spear build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Vyke's War Spear focuses on maximizing Madness infliction and Fire damage, primarily through its unique skill, Frenzyflame Thrust, which is heavily boosted by the Shard of Alexander. The weapon scales best with Dexterity (C scaling at base), making high investment in this stat crucial for maximizing damage output, while Faith contributes to Fire damage. According to Reddit, the weapon scales mainly with Dexterity. The Fire Scorpion Charm further enhances the weapon's Fire damage. High poise armor, like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets, combined with the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman, allows you to withstand hits while delivering powerful blows. The Clarifying Horn Charm helps mitigate the Madness buildup inflicted by the weapon skill, which can be detrimental if not managed, According to Reddit. The strategic approach involves applying Faith-based buffs (using a seal like the Frenzied Flame Seal), engaging with standard and charged attacks, and strategically using the enhanced Frenzyflame Thrust to inflict Madness and deal high Fire damage, potentially utilizing the Carian Filigreed Crest to reduce FP cost for more frequent skill usage. The Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost Fire damage and Dexterity for maximum damage.

fields.name: Lance build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Lance emphasizes Strength scaling, achieved through two-handing and a Heavy infusion. This approach capitalizes on the Lance's piercing damage. The Spear Talisman is crucial for increasing counter-attack damage, which significantly boosts pierce damage, According to a YouTube video. The Shard of Alexander is essential for enhancing the chosen Ash of War, such as Charge Forth. High poise armor, like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets, and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman increase survivability. The strategy incorporates buffs, standard and charged attacks, and strategic use of the enhanced Ash of War to deal heavy damage and break enemy stances. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick helps increase poise damage.

fields.name: Dual Lance build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Lances (Heavy infused) focuses on overwhelming enemies with powerstanced attacks and maximizing piercing damage. High Strength investment is essential. The Claw Talisman significantly boosts the damage of powerstanced jump attacks. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage through successive hits. The Spear Talisman enhances counterattacks. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing the stamina drain and equip load. This strategy involves jump attacks, sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear boost poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Treespear build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Treespear relies on its Dexterity and Faith scaling to deal both Physical and Holy damage. High Faith investment is crucial for maximizing the Holy damage and the Treespear's weapon skill, Sacred Order, which buffs Holy damage and is especially strong against undead. The weapon's piercing damage type is exploited with the Spear Talisman for increased counter-attack damage. Axe Talisman enhances charged attacks, and Sacred Scorpion Charm further boosts Holy damage. Heavy armor with high poise, like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets, and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying Faith buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength, which stack with Sacred Order) using an off-hand seal, then using standard and charged attacks, along with the Sacred Order skill, to deal damage and break enemy stances. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boosts Holy damage.

fields.name: Treespear & Cleanrot Spear build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Treespears or one paired with another suitable Great Spear maximizes damage output through continuous powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks. High Faith and Dexterity are crucial for maximizing the damage of both weapons, and Sacred Order is used to apply a Holy buff to both weapons (though the buff only applies to the main hand). The Claw Talisman significantly boosts the damage of powerstanced jump attacks. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits. The Spear Talisman enhances counterattacks, and the Sacred Scorpion Charm further boosts Holy damage. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing the stamina drain and equip load. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically utilizing the main hand's Sacred Order to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing Holy damage. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith for maximum damage.

fields.name: Dual Treespear build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Treespears or one paired with another suitable Great Spear maximizes damage output through continuous powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks. High Faith and Dexterity are crucial for maximizing the damage of both weapons, and Sacred Order is used to apply a Holy buff to both weapons (though the buff only applies to the main hand). The Claw Talisman significantly boosts the damage of powerstanced jump attacks. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits. The Spear Talisman enhances counterattacks, and the Sacred Scorpion Charm further boosts Holy damage. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing the stamina drain and equip load. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically utilizing the main hand's Sacred Order to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing Holy damage. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith for maximum damage.

fields.name: Lion Greatbow build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Lion Greatbow centers on utilizing its weapon skill, Radahn's Rain, and its passive 20% damage bonus when using Radahn's Spears, according to the Elden Ring Wiki. High Strength is crucial for maximizing the weapon's damage, with 54 being the key breakpoint for two-handing to achieve 81 effective Strength, reaching the soft cap. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting Radahn's Rain damage, according to YouTube. The Arrow's Sting Talisman further enhances arrow damage, while the Arrow's Reach Talisman reduces damage falloff at a distance. The Ritual Sword Talisman boosts damage when at full health, making it ideal for the ranged playstyle, according to Fextralife. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength using a seal in the off-hand), initiating combat at range with Radahn's Rain to inflict heavy damage, especially on large enemies, and following up with standard attacks using Radahn's Spears or Golem's Great Arrows, switching to a melee weapon when enemies close in or for sustained damage in close quarters. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear can be used in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to further boost Holy damage and Faith for incantation use.

fields.name: Lion Greatbow & Golem Greatbow build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Lion Greatbows (or one Lion and one Golem's Greatbow) focuses on maximizing damage output through continuous volleys of arrows and exploiting the passive bonus for Radahn's Spears. High Strength investment remains paramount, as Greatbows scale with this stat. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting the damage of Radahn's Rain, which can be unleashed from both bows. The Arrow's Sting Talisman further increases arrow damage, and the Arrow's Reach Talisman helps maintain damage at range. If using Radahn's Spears, the Lord of Blood's Exultation could be considered for its damage boost when bleed occurs, According to YouTube, though Radahn's Spears don't have innate bleed. High Endurance (30-35 or higher) is necessary to manage the equip load of two Greatbows and arrows. This strategy involves initiating combat with powerful volleys of Radahn's Rain, followed by standard attacks using Radahn's Spears (benefiting from the doubled passive bonus) or other Great Arrows (like Golem's Great Arrows for AoE damage). According to YouTube, the Lion Greatbow works phenomenally on larger enemies. Maintaining distance and managing arrow types are key to this ranged playstyle. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith for maximum damage and incantation use.

fields.name: Lion Greatbow & Claymore build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Lion Greatbow centers on utilizing its weapon skill, Radahn's Rain, and its passive 20% damage bonus when using Radahn's Spears, according to the Elden Ring Wiki. High Strength is crucial for maximizing the weapon's damage, with 54 being the key breakpoint for two-handing to achieve 81 effective Strength, reaching the soft cap. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting Radahn's Rain damage, according to YouTube. The Arrow's Sting Talisman further enhances arrow damage, while the Arrow's Reach Talisman reduces damage falloff at a distance. The Ritual Sword Talisman boosts damage when at full health, making it ideal for the ranged playstyle, according to Fextralife. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength using a seal in the off-hand), initiating combat at range with Radahn's Rain to inflict heavy damage, especially on large enemies, and following up with standard attacks using Radahn's Spears or Golem's Great Arrows, switching to a melee weapon when enemies close in or for sustained damage in close quarters. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear can be used in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to further boost Holy damage and Faith for incantation use.

fields.name: Golem Greatbow build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Golem Greatbow focuses on its inherent Strength scaling, maximized by wielding it two-handed (requiring only 54 Strength for the soft cap bonus), and leveraging the high raw damage from Golem's Great Arrows, which also deal extra poise damage and create a small AoE on impact. The Shard of Alexander is crucial for enhancing the Through and Through skill, allowing for powerful piercing shots. The Arrow's Sting Talisman further increases arrow damage, while the Arrow's Reach Talisman helps maintain damage at long distances. High poise armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability during aggressive engagements. The strategic approach involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength using a seal in the off-hand), initiating combat at range, using Through and Through to pierce enemies and break stance, and following up with standard attacks using Golem's Great Arrows. The Spiked Cracked Tear and Strength-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick can further boost damage.

fields.name: Golem Greatbow & Lion Greatbow build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Golem Greatbows (or one Golem and one Lion Greatbow) maximizes damage output through continuous volleys of arrows and exploiting the combined strength of both bows. High Strength investment remains paramount, as Greatbows scale with this stat. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting the damage of Through and Through, which can be unleashed from both bows. The Arrow's Sting Talisman further increases arrow damage, and the Arrow's Reach Talisman helps maintain damage at range. If using a Lion Greatbow in the off-hand, the Lord of Blood's Exultation could be considered if using Radahn's Spears, which lack innate bleed but may be buffed with bleed-inducing consumables, According to YouTube. High Endurance (30-35 or higher) is necessary to manage the equip load of two Greatbows and arrows. This strategy involves initiating combat with powerful volleys, potentially using Through and Through from both bows, followed by standard attacks using Golem's Great Arrows (benefiting from the high base damage) or Radahn's Spears (if using the Lion Greatbow for its passive bonus). The Spiked Cracked Tear and Strength-Knot Crystal Tear can further boost damage.

fields.name: Golem Greatbow & Iron Greatsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Golem Greatbow focuses on its inherent Strength scaling, maximized by wielding it two-handed (requiring only 54 Strength for the soft cap bonus), and leveraging the high raw damage from Golem's Great Arrows, which also deal extra poise damage and create a small AoE on impact. The Shard of Alexander is crucial for enhancing the Through and Through skill, allowing for powerful piercing shots. The Arrow's Sting Talisman further increases arrow damage, while the Arrow's Reach Talisman helps maintain damage at long distances. High poise armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability during aggressive engagements. The strategic approach involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength using a seal in the off-hand), initiating combat at range, using Through and Through to pierce enemies and break stance, and following up with standard attacks using Golem's Great Arrows. The Spiked Cracked Tear and Strength-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick can further boost damage. In close combat the iron greatsword works effectively as a seconday weapon to use if unavoidable.

fields.name: Erdtree Greatbow build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Erdtree Greatbow focuses on maximizing its Holy damage output and the potency of its unique skill, Through and Through. High Faith is the most crucial scaling stat for both the weapon's Holy damage (D scaling at base, improving with upgrades) and the power of its skill, as well as the effectiveness of Holy-based incantations. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting the damage of Through and Through, while the Sacred Scorpion Charm provides a significant bonus to Holy attack power. High Vigor and medium armor allow for survivability and maneuverability, while the Arrow's Sting and Arrow's Reach Talismans ensure consistent damage at range. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs like Golden Vow using a Faith-scaling seal (like the Godslayer's Seal or Erdtree Seal), engaging enemies at a distance with standard attacks and Through and Through, and utilizing the Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to further enhance Holy damage and Faith, prioritizing ranged combat and picking off enemies from afar.

fields.name: Erdtree Greatbow & Winged Scythe build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy combines the ranged power of the Erdtree Greatbow with a strong Faith-scaling melee weapon to offer versatility in combat. High Faith remains paramount for maximizing the damage of both the Erdtree Greatbow and the chosen melee weapon (e.g., Sacred-infused Great Mace). The Shard of Alexander boosts Through and Through, while the Sacred Scorpion Charm enhances Holy damage from both sources. The Arrow's Sting Talisman increases arrow damage. The Ritual Sword Talisman boosts attack power when at full health, benefiting both ranged and careful melee engagements. High Vigor and medium to heavy armor with good poise ensure survivability in both ranged and close-quarters combat. This strategy involves starting encounters at range with the Erdtree Greatbow, using standard attacks and Through and Through, then switching to the melee weapon for closer engagements or enemies resistant to holy damage. Using the Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximizes Holy damage and Faith for both ranged and melee attacks, providing a versatile approach to various combat scenarios.

fields.name: Erdtree Greatbow & Great Mace build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy combines the ranged power of the Erdtree Greatbow with a strong Faith-scaling melee weapon to offer versatility in combat. High Faith remains paramount for maximizing the damage of both the Erdtree Greatbow and the chosen melee weapon (e.g., Sacred-infused Great Mace). High Vigor and medium to heavy armor with good poise ensure survivability in both ranged and close-quarters combat. This strategy involves starting encounters at range with the Erdtree Greatbow, using standard attacks and Through and Through, then switching to the melee weapon for closer engagements or enemies resistant to holy damage. Using the Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximizes Holy damage and Faith for both ranged and melee attacks, providing a versatile approach to various combat scenarios.

fields.name: Dragonclaw Shield & Dragon Claw build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy centers on the Dragonclaw Greatshield's defensive strength, utilizing its high guard boost and damage negation, according to the Elden Ring Wiki. It relies on high Strength for both the shield's scaling (which improves from D to C) and the chosen colossal weapon, such as the Dragon Greatclaw, which offers both Physical and Lightning damage, or a powerful Heavy infused Great Mace for its stance-breaking potential. The Greatshield Talisman further enhances blocking effectiveness by reducing stamina consumption. Defensive talismans like the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman and high poise armor (Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets) are crucial for absorbing hits and avoiding interruptions during attacks or Shield Bash, according to Rock Paper Shotgun. Strategic gameplay involves using the shield to block enemy attacks, then counter-attacking with the off-hand weapon or Shield Bash to stagger enemies and deal damage, especially against Dragon-type enemies who take increased damage from the Dragonclaw Greatshield. Buffs can be used to further boost offense or defense. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick helps break enemy stances more quickly, and the Opaline Bubbletear provides an extra layer of defense against a single hit.

fields.name: Dragonclaw Shield & Treespear build
fields.description: This approach focuses on a balanced offense and defense, using the Dragonclaw Greatshield to absorb hits and a maneuverable melee weapon for damage. Strength and Dexterity are necessary to meet the shield's requirements, and further investment in Strength can boost damage, while Faith (at least 25) allows for access to powerful buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength using an off-hand seal. The chosen melee weapon, such as the Treespear (Sacred affinity) or Lance (Heavy or Sacred), allows for safe poking attacks while blocking, and benefits from the Spear Talisman, According to Reddit, which significantly boosts counter-attack damage with piercing weapons. High Endurance (35-40) is essential for wearing heavy armor and managing stamina. Radagon's Soreseal can be considered for hitting stat requirements, but the damage negation penalty should be carefully managed with the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman. Strategic gameplay involves holding the Dragonclaw Greatshield to absorb incoming attacks, then Guard Countering or poking with the melee weapon during openings, utilizing buffs to enhance damage or defense. According to Reddit, Guard Counters with smaller weapons can be faster. The Stamina Regeneration Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick ensures sustained blocking and attacks, while the Opaline Bubbletear provides an extra defensive layer.

fields.name: Erdtree Greatshield & Golden Halberd build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Erdtree Greatshield leverages its high guard boost (66) and damage negation, According to the Elden Ring Wiki. It scales with Strength (D at base) and Faith (D at base). High Faith investment boosts the effectiveness of its unique skill, Golden Retaliation, which retaliates against magic with a powerful golden beam, According to TheGamer. This strategy relies on tanking hits and utilizing the counter-magic potential. The Shard of Alexander is crucial for enhancing the damage of Golden Retaliation. High poise armor (Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets) and the Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability while guarding, while the Sacred Scorpion Charm further enhances the holy damage of Golden Retaliation and the chosen melee weapon, According to YouTube, the Sacred Scorpion Charm and high Faith work well with the Erdtree Greatshield. Strategic gameplay involves blocking attacks, activating Golden Retaliation against spells and incantations to deal damage and potentially break enemy stance, and following up with standard attacks from the chosen melee weapon, like the Golden Halberd. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Opaline Bubbletear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick amplify Holy damage and provide crucial defense.

fields.name: Erdtree Greatshield & Ordovis's Greatsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Erdtree Greatshield leverages its high guard boost (66) and damage negation, According to the Elden Ring Wiki. fields.name: Erdtree Greatshield & Treepsear build
fields.description: This approach focuses on using the Erdtree Greatshield to absorb damage and counter magic, while a melee weapon, like the Treespear or a heavy thrusting sword, allows for effective guard pokes and aggressive play. High Strength and Faith are key stats for this build, scaling both the shield and the chosen melee weapon. The Greatshield Talisman and high poise armor ensure efficient blocking, while the Sacred Scorpion Charm and Shard of Alexander boost the Holy damage and skill damage, respectively, According to Reddit. Radagon's Soreseal can be used to meet stat requirements, but the damage negation penalty must be offset by the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman. Strategic gameplay involves holding the shield to absorb hits and utilizing Golden Retaliation to counter magic, then Guard Countering or poking with the melee weapon during openings. The Stamina Regeneration Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick helps maintain stamina for sustained blocking and attacks, while the Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear boosts Holy damage for both the shield skill and the melee weapon. This offers a balanced approach, allowing for both strong defense and consistent offense.

fields.name: Erdtree Greatshield & Great Epee build
fields.description: This approach focuses on using the Erdtree Greatshield to absorb damage and counter magic, while a melee weapon, like the Treespear or a heavy thrusting sword, allows for effective guard pokes and aggressive play. fields.name: Jellyfish Shield & Godslayer's Greatsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Jellyfish Shield centers on its unique skill, Contagious Fury, which provides a potent +20% damage buff for 30 seconds when activated and held. The shield's scaling with Strength is a D at base. After applying the buff, quickly switch to your primary weapon, which can be a strong Strength-scaling weapon like a Colossal Sword or Great Axe, or a weapon that scales with Dexterity, Intelligence, Faith, or Arcane depending on your build's offensive focus. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting the damage of your chosen weapon's Ash of War. High Vigor and medium armor ensure survivability, and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman enhances physical defense. The Ritual Sword Talisman is ideal for maintaining the damage buff by encouraging a cautious playstyle. The Flask of Wondrous Physick, equipped with a relevant Knot Crystal Tear and the Spiked Cracked Tear, further boosts damage, especially for charged attacks. The core combat flow involves activating Contagious Fury, switching to the weapon, and using its standard attacks, charged attacks (if applicable), and Ash of War to deal significant damage while the buff is active. You must keep the shield out to maintain the buff, According to the Elden Ring Wiki.

fields.name: Inseparable Sword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Inseparable Sword focuses on its strong Faith scaling (B at +7) and ability to deal Holy damage, especially against Undead enemies (20% bonus damage). High Faith investment maximizes both the weapon's damage and the effectiveness of its unique skill, Sacred Blade, which buffs the weapon with Holy damage and fires a Holy projectile, According to YouTube. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting Sacred Blade's damage, while the Sacred Scorpion Charm further amplifies Holy attack power. High Vigor and heavy armor with high poise (Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets) and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability, compensating for the weapon's short range and lack of hyper armor, According to YouTube. The gameplay involves applying Faith buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength using a seal in the off-hand), initiating combat by buffing with Sacred Blade, and utilizing standard attacks, charged attacks (Axe Talisman benefit), and the Sacred Blade projectile to deal heavy Holy damage and control space. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost Holy damage and Faith for maximum effectiveness.

fields.name: Inseparable Sword & Golden Order Greatsword build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with the Inseparable Sword paired with another Faith-scaling Greatsword focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks and Holy damage. High Faith investment is crucial for maximizing the damage of both weapons, as the Inseparable Sword scales well with Faith. The Claw Talisman is a key component, significantly boosting the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary offensive maneuver for initiating combat and dealing burst damage. The Shard of Alexander boosts the damage of Sacred Blade from the Inseparable Sword. The Sacred Scorpion Charm provides a vital boost to the Holy damage from both weapons, and the Godfrey Icon further enhances charged attacks. High Endurance (35-40) is essential for managing the stamina drain from wielding two heavy weapons and wearing heavy armor. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using Sacred Blade from the main hand (boosted by Shard of Alexander) to deal burst Holy damage and control space, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing Holy damage. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith for maximum damage.

fields.name: Iron Greatsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Iron Greatsword focuses on maximizing its Strength scaling. This is achieved through two-handing the sword (requiring 80 Strength for optimal damage) and using a Heavy infusion (A scaling at +25). The Shard of Alexander is crucial for enhancing the chosen Ash of War, such as Lion's Claw, which is known for its high damage, poise breaking, and hyper armor. Heavy armor, like the Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets, and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. The Axe Talisman boosts charged attacks, and the Godfrey Icon further amplifies charged attacks and skills. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (such as Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength), engaging with standard and charged attacks, and using the enhanced Ash of War to stagger enemies and deal heavy damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise damage and charged attacks. According to YouTube, 60 Vigor and heavy armor for poise are essential.

fields.name: Iron Greatsword & Claymore build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Iron Greatswords (or one paired with another Strength-scaling Greatsword, such as the Claymore) focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, which are significantly enhanced by the Claw Talisman. High Strength investment (80) is paramount for maximizing the damage of both Greatswords (Heavy infused). The Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor and the Claw Talisman combine to greatly boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding attacks. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing the stamina drain and equip load of two heavy weapons and heavy armor. Strategic gameplay involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War (boosted by the Shard of Alexander) to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance. According to YouTube, using Royal Knight's Resolve with this build can result in massive damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Lordsworn's Greatsword buid
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy uses the Lordsworn's Greatsword's Strength scaling, which improves to B with a Heavy infusion, and its high 110 critical modifier. The Dagger Talisman enhances critical hit damage, and the Shard of Alexander boosts the damage of the chosen Ash of War, such as Lion's Claw, which breaks stance and sets up critical strikes. High poise armor, like Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets, increases survivability during engagements, allowing someone to absorb hits and avoid interruption. The strategy involves applying buffs, engaging with standard and charged attacks (boosted by the Axe Talisman), and using the enhanced Ash of War to quickly break enemy stance. Following up with a critical hit maximizes damage output, especially after triggering the Stonebarb Cracked Tear from the Flask of Wondrous Physick, which increases poise damage.

fields.name: Lordsworn's Greatsword & Iron Greatsword build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Lordsworn's Greatswords, or one paired with another Strength-scaling Greatsword like the Iron Greatsword, focuses on overwhelming enemies with powerstanced jump attacks. A high Strength investment (80) is essential for maximizing damage. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor boost the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary offensive maneuver for dealing damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the nature of dual-wielding attacks. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load. The strategy involves initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while maintaining high damage output. On YouTube, 60 Vigor and heavy armor for poise are considered essential for this type of build. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear boost poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Ordovis's Greatsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Ordovis's Greatsword leverages its high Strength scaling and its potent weapon skill, Ordovis's Vortex. According to the Elden Ring Wiki, it deals both physical and Holy damage, primarily scaling with Strength, and has high stance damage, especially when fully charged. Investing up to 80 Strength and wielding it two-handed maximizes raw physical damage, while a minimal Faith investment (25) allows access to powerful buffs like Golden Vow using a Clawmark Seal. The Shard of Alexander and Godfrey Icon are essential for boosting the damage of Ordovis's Vortex, a key offensive ability with high stance damage. According to YouTube, it is recommended to spam the Ash of War for its high stance and physical damage. High poise armor (like the Crucible Axe Set) and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, engaging with standard and charged attacks, using the enhanced Ordovis's Vortex to stagger enemies, and following up with critical hits or more heavy attacks. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost poise and Holy damage, respectively.

fields.name: Dark Moon Greatsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Dark Moon Greatsword focuses on maximizing its Intelligence scaling, which is a C at base and improves to B with upgrades. High Intelligence investment is crucial for maximizing both the weapon's Magic damage and the power of its skill, Moonlight Greatsword. This skill buffs the weapon's magic attack power and imbues the blade with frost, allowing charged attacks to unleash devastating blasts of moonlight, According to IGN. The Shard of Alexander and Godfrey Icon are essential talismans, significantly boosting the damage of these charged attacks and projectiles. High Vigor and a medium equip load ensure survivability and maneuverability, crucial for positioning and evading attacks. The gameplay involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength if Faith is incorporated, using a staff in the off-hand), activating Moonlight Greatsword, and then using a mix of standard attacks, charged R2s (which fire projectiles), and sorceries for burst damage and staggering enemies. Ranni's Dark Moon is particularly effective as an opener for its damage and magic resistance debuff, which the Dark Moon Greatsword can then capitalize on with its Holy damage, According to YouTube. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Cerulean Hidden Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximize Magic damage and allow for sustained skill/spell usage.

fields.name: Dark Moon Greatsword & Carian Regal Sceptor build
fields.description: The combined approach, typically pairing the Dark Moon Greatsword with a powerful staff like the Carian Regal Scepter (which buffs full moon sorceries), focuses on a powerful Intelligence-based spellblade playstyle. High Intelligence investment is paramount, as the Dark Moon Greatsword's damage scales primarily with this stat, and it also boosts the power of offensive sorceries like Greatblade Phalanx and Loretta's Greatbow. The Shard of Alexander and Godfrey Icon are crucial for enhancing both the weapon's skill and charged spells. The Magic Scorpion Charm further amplifies magic damage. High Vigor and a medium equip load ensure survivability, allowing you to engage in melee or cast spells effectively. Strategic gameplay involves initiating with powerful spells like Ranni's Dark Moon to debuff enemies, then utilizing Greatblade Phalanx for staggering, and following up with the Dark Moon Greatsword's charged R2 attacks (releasing moonlight waves). According to YouTube, mixing Greatblade Phalanx and charged R2 attacks allows for repeated staggering. The Spellblade's Set further enhances the weapon skill's damage. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Cerulean Hidden Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximize magic damage and allow for sustained spell/skill usage, offering a versatile approach to various combat scenarios. According to FextraLife, this build is effective at quickly killing enemies.

fields.name: Helphen's Steeple build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Helphen's Steeple focuses on a Strength/Intelligence hybrid build, leveraging both the weapon's physical and magic damage, as well as its unique skill, Ruinous Ghostflame, which adds magic damage and Frostbite buildup. Investment in both Strength (50-55, higher for two-handing) and Intelligence (50-55, optimal breakpoint) is crucial, According to YouTube, you can reach 55 Strength and 50 Intelligence. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting the damage of Ruinous Ghostflame, while the Magic Scorpion Charm further amplifies magic damage. High Vigor and heavy armor with high poise (Night's Cavalry Set) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (using a staff like the Carian Regal Scepter in the off-hand), activating Ruinous Ghostflame to infuse the weapon with Frostbite, and using a mix of standard attacks, charged R2s, and sorceries to deal significant damage and build up Frostbite, potentially leading to critical hits, According to YouTube, jumping heavy attacks and charged heavy attacks are effective for breaking a boss's stance. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Stonebarb Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost magic damage and poise damage, respectively.

fields.name: Helphen's Steeple & Carian Regal Sceptre build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Helphen's Steeple focuses on a Strength/Intelligence hybrid build, leveraging both the weapon's physical and magic damage, as well as its unique skill, Ruinous Ghostflame, which adds magic damage and Frostbite buildup. Investment in both Strength (50-55, higher for two-handing) and Intelligence (50-55, optimal breakpoint) is crucial, According to YouTube, you can reach 55 Strength and 50 Intelligence. The Shard of Alexander is essential for boosting the damage of Ruinous Ghostflame, while the Magic Scorpion Charm further amplifies magic damage. High Vigor and heavy armor with high poise (Night's Cavalry Set) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (using a staff like the Carian Regal Scepter in the off-hand), activating Ruinous Ghostflame to infuse the weapon with Frostbite, and using a mix of standard attacks, charged R2s, and sorceries to deal significant damage and build up Frostbite, potentially leading to critical hits, According to YouTube, jumping heavy attacks and charged heavy attacks are effective for breaking a boss's stance. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Stonebarb Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost magic damage and poise damage, respectively.

fields.name: Helphen's Steeple & Dark Moon Greatsword build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with Helphen's Steeple paired with the Dark Moon Greatsword creates a potent Frostbite-inflicting build. High Strength (39) and Intelligence (60) are crucial for maximizing the damage of both Greatswords and the effectiveness of their unique skills and Frostbite buildup. The Claw Talisman is a key component, significantly boosting the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary offensive maneuver for initiating combat and inflicting Frostbite. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits. The Shard of Alexander boosts Ruinous Ghostflame, which quickly buffs the Helphen's Steeple with Frostbite, making it ideal to keep in the main hand. The Magic Scorpion Charm increases overall magic damage. High Vigor and heavy armor (Night's Cavalry Set) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal ensure survivability. This strategy involves initiating with Ruinous Ghostflame to infuse the Helphen's Steeple with Frostbite, then using powerful powerstanced jump attacks with both Greatswords to rapidly build up Frostbite on enemies, utilizing the Frostbite status for burst damage. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Cerulean Hidden Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost magic damage and allow for sustained skill and spell usage, offering a dynamic and powerful approach to combat. According to YouTube, this build is versatile and requires changes in playstyle depending on the situation.

fields.name: Blasphemous Blade build
fields.description: The Blasphemous Blade's single-wielding strategy centers on maximizing the effectiveness of its powerful weapon skill, Taker's Flames, and its innate healing capabilities, According to Eurogamer. High Faith investment (60+) is crucial, as Taker's Flames scales purely with Faith and deals significant fire damage. The Shard of Alexander and Fire Scorpion Charm significantly boost the damage of Taker's Flames, while the Carian Filigreed Crest reduces its FP cost, allowing for more frequent use. The passive healing effect, which triggers when enemies die near the player, combined with Taker's Flames' healing on hit, provides excellent sustain. Strategic gameplay involves applying incantation buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength using an off-hand seal, initiating combat with Taker's Flames to deal massive fire damage and heal, and utilizing standard attacks for follow-up damage while the buff is active. The Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further maximize fire damage and Faith scaling.

fields.name: Blasphemous Blade & Godslayer's Greatsword build
fields.description: The combined approach leverages the Blasphemous Blade for its powerful Taker's Flames and healing, while also incorporating a strong Faith-scaling melee weapon or a diverse set of incantations for enhanced versatility. High Faith investment (60+) is crucial for maximizing the effectiveness of both the Blasphemous Blade and the chosen secondary weapon or spells. The Shard of Alexander and Fire Scorpion Charm are essential for boosting Taker's Flames' damage. The Ritual Sword Talisman boosts attack power when at full health, complementing the healing provided by the Blasphemous Blade. High Vigor and a good balance of Mind and Endurance ensure survivability, sustained skill usage, and the ability to equip medium to heavy armor for poise. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength, utilizing Taker's Flames to deal burst damage and heal, and switching to the secondary weapon for melee combat or Guard Countering, or using incantations like Stone of Gurranq for ranged attacks and different damage types, According to FextraLife. The Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost fire damage and Faith scaling. According to YouTube, this allows for flexibility, offering substantial damage at range using Taker's Flame or up close with dual greatsword jump attacks.

fields.name: Banished Knight's Greatsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Banished Knight's Greatsword maximizes Strength scaling through two-handing and a Heavy infusion, improving scaling to A at +25. The two-handed moveset allows for aggressive attacks. The Shard of Alexander enhances the chosen Ash of War, such as Lion's Claw, known for high damage, poise breaking, and hyper armor. Heavy armor, like the Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets, and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. The Axe Talisman boosts charged attacks, and the Godfrey Icon amplifies charged attacks and skills. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, engaging with standard and charged attacks, and using the enhanced Ash of War to stagger enemies and deal heavy damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise damage and charged attacks.

fields.name: Banished Knight's Greatsword & Iron Greatsword build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Banished Knight's Greatswords (or one paired with another Strength-scaling Greatsword like the Iron Greatsword) focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman. High Strength investment (80) is paramount for maximizing the damage of both Greatswords (Heavy infused). The Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor and the Claw Talisman combine to boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding attacks. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two heavy weapons and heavy armor,. Strategic gameplay involves initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Sword of Milos build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Sword of Milos focuses on its unique properties, including FP restoration on kill (5 FP) and the powerful Shriek of Milos weapon skill. High Strength and Dexterity are necessary to maximize physical and bleed damage. The Roar Medallion significantly buffs the modified heavy attacks of Shriek of Milos, and the Ritual Sword Talisman boosts damage when at full health. Heavy armor and the Great-Jar's Arsenal or Erdtree's Favor +2 manage equip load, allowing for survivability during aggressive engagements. The gameplay involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength, possibly using a Highland Axe in the off-hand for the Roar buff), activating Shriek of Milos to debuff enemies and initiate the powerful heavy attack combo, and utilizing standard attacks and the FP regen to maintain pressure. The Spiked Cracked Tear and Thorny Cracked Tear further enhance charged attack damage and successive attack power, respectively.

fields.name: Claymore build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Claymore focuses on maximizing Strength scaling. This is achieved through two-handing, which requires 80 Strength for optimal damage, and a Heavy infusion, which results in A scaling at +25. The Claymore's balanced moveset and powerful pierce heavy attacks benefit from the Spear Talisman. The Shard of Alexander enhances the chosen Ash of War, such as Impaling Thrust, which deals high stance damage and can be followed by a heavy attack, or Lion's Claw for damage, poise breaking, and hyper armor. Heavy armor, like the Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets, and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. The Axe Talisman boosts charged attacks, and the Godfrey Icon amplifies charged attacks and skills. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, engaging with standard and charged attacks, and using the enhanced Ash of War to stagger enemies. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise damage and charged attacks. According to YouTube, this allows for flexibility.

fields.name: Claymore & Iron Greatsword build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Claymores, or one paired with another Strength-scaling Greatsword like the Iron Greatsword, focuses on overwhelming enemies with powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks. These are enhanced by the Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor. High Strength investment (80) is key for maximizing the damage of both Greatswords (Heavy infused). The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous dual-wielding attacks. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load. Strategic gameplay involves jump attacks followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander. This strategy aims to rapidly deplete enemy health and stance. According to YouTube, it is recommended to get the Raptor's Black Feathers. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost poise and charged attack damage.

fields.name: Gargoyle's Greatsword
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Gargoyle's Greatsword focuses on maximizing Strength scaling, achieved through two-handing (requiring 80 Strength for optimal damage) and a Heavy infusion (A scaling at +25). The weapon's moveset, including its default skill Vacuum Slice, can be leveraged to deal damage at range. The Shard of Alexander enhances the chosen Ash of War, such as Lion's Claw, or the Vacuum Slice, maximizing impact. Heavy armor like the Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets, and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. The Axe Talisman boosts charged attacks, and the Godfrey Icon amplifies charged attacks and skills. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, engaging with standard and charged attacks, and using the enhanced Ash of War or Vacuum Slice to stagger enemies and deal damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise damage and charged attacks. According to YouTube, using a Heavy infusion with high strength is a strong way to play the Gargoyle's Greatsword.

fields.name: Gargoyle's Greatsword & Iron Greatsword build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Gargoyle's Greatswords (or one paired with another Strength-scaling Greatsword like the Iron Greatsword) focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, which are significantly enhanced by the Claw Talisman. High Strength investment (80) is paramount for maximizing the damage of both Greatswords (Heavy infused). The Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor and the Claw Talisman combine to boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding attacks. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two heavy weapons and heavy armor. Strategic gameplay involves initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost poise and charged attack damage, respectively. According to YouTube, this build allows for strong poise and stance breaking potential.

fields.name: Death's Poker & Staff of Loss build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Death's Poker revolves around its powerful skill, Ghostflame Ignition, which deals 100% Magic damage and scales purely with Intelligence. High Intelligence (50-60, with the soft cap around 50) is crucial for maximizing its damage output. The Spellblade Set and Magic Scorpion Charm boost Ghostflame Ignition damage. The Shard of Alexander further amplifies its damage by 15%. While the weapon's melee damage might be lower than other Greatswords, it still benefits from Strength and Dexterity scaling. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs like Terra Magica (using the Staff of Loss in the off-hand for an added boost) and using Ghostflame Ignition's R1 or R2 follow-ups to apply Frostbite, deal magic damage, and control the battlefield. The Carian Filigreed Crest manages FP cost, allowing for more frequent skill usage. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Cerulean Hidden Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick provide a significant damage boost and sustain during challenging encounters, enabling the repeated use of this powerful skill. The weapon's unique R2 attack can be useful for dodging under enemy attacks and punishing backsteps.

fields.name: Death's Poker & Treespear build
fields.description: The combined approach pairs Death's Poker with another weapon or shield to create a more versatile build. High Intelligence (50-60) remains crucial for the effectiveness of Ghostflame Ignition. The Spellblade Set, Magic Scorpion Charm, and Shard of Alexander are still essential for maximizing skill damage. Pairing Death's Poker with a weapon like the Blasphemous Blade allows for rapid Frostbite buildup and resetting the debuff with fire damage, creating a continuous damage cycle. The Treespear offers Holy damage and access to buffs like Golden Vow, which can be applied using a seal. Using a shield like the Scorpion Kite Shield allows for block counters, particularly with piercing weapons or when paired with the Curved Sword Talisman for increased guard counter damage, and. Strategic gameplay involves initiating with Ghostflame Ignition to apply Frostbite and deal magic damage, then switching to the secondary weapon to capitalize on the Frostbite debuff or engage in melee combat when appropriate, utilizing buffs to further enhance offensive or defensive capabilities. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Cerulean Hidden Tear or Greenburst Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximize damage and sustain depending on the chosen secondary equipment and playstyle.

fields.name: Gargoyle's Blackblade build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Gargoyle's Blackblade centers on its unique skill, Corpse Wax Cutter, which deals Holy damage and inflicts a burning effect, dealing slow HP damage to opponents, According to YouTube. Investment in both Strength (up to 50) and Faith (up to 50) is recommended for balanced damage output. The Shard of Alexander boosts the damage of Corpse Wax Cutter by 15%. The Sacred Scorpion Charm further amplifies Holy damage. Heavy armor with high poise (Bull-Goat or Lionel's sets) and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (using a Clawmark Seal in the off-hand), initiating combat with Corpse Wax Cutter to apply the burning effect and Holy damage, and utilizing standard attacks, charged attacks, and Guard Counters with the powerful Greatsword moveset. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximize Holy damage and Faith scaling. According to FextraLife, this allows for a versatile and powerful build.

fields.name: Gargoyle's Blackblade & Blasphemous Blade build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy pairs Gargoyle's Blackblade with another Faith-scaling Greatsword, such as the Blasphemous Blade or a Sacred infused Gargoyle's Greatsword, to maximize Holy and Fire/Physical damage and apply status effects. Investment in both Strength (up to 50) and Faith (up to 50) is crucial for optimal damage with both weapons, According to FextraLife, it is optimal. The Claw Talisman significantly boosts the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, a primary offensive maneuver. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits. The Shard of Alexander boosts Corpse Wax Cutter, and the Sacred Scorpion Charm amplifies Holy damage. High Endurance (35-40) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength), using Corpse Wax Cutter from the Gargoyle's Blackblade, followed by powerful powerstanced jump attacks, and sustained powerstanced attacks to rapidly deplete enemy health and apply the Corpse Wax Cutter's burning status effect, along with the effects of the off-hand weapon (e.g., healing from Blasphemous Blade). According to FextraLife, this build offers durability and versatility. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith scaling.

fields.name: Banished Knight Halberd build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Banished Knight's Halberd capitalizes on its excellent reach and piercing moveset for effective counterattacks. High Strength investment, maximized through two-handing (requiring 80 Strength for optimal damage) and a Heavy infusion, is crucial for damage output. The Spear Talisman significantly boosts damage when hitting enemies during their attack animations, synergizing with the Halberd's thrusting attacks. The Shard of Alexander enhances the chosen Ash of War, such as Giant Hunt, which is strong for breaking enemy stance. Heavy armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Rallying Standard or Bloodboil Aromatic), using standard and charged attacks, and leveraging the chosen Ash of War to stagger enemies and deal heavy damage, especially with the counterattack bonus. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise damage and charged attacks.

fields.name: Commander's Standard build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Commander's Standard capitalizes on its Strength scaling, which improves to B with upgrades, and its exceptional reach. High Strength investment, maximized through two-handing (requiring 80 Strength for optimal damage), is crucial for damage output. The Spear Talisman significantly boosts damage when hitting enemies during their attack animations, synergizing with the Halberd's thrusting attacks. The Old Lord's Talisman extends the duration of the potent Rallying Standard buff, increasing both attack power and defense by 20% for an extended period. Heavy armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (such as Rallying Standard), using standard and charged attacks, and leveraging the Halberd's reach to keep enemies at bay while dealing consistent damage. The Stamina Regeneration Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance stamina recovery and charged attacks. According to YouTube, the Commander's Standard's thrusting attacks make use of its long reach.

The Spear Talisman significantly boosts damage when hitting enemies during their attack animations, synergizing with the Halberd's thrusting attacks. High Strength investment (80) is paramount for maximizing the damage of both Halberds (Heavy infused). The Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor and the Claw Talisman combine to boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding attacks. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (such as Rallying Standard), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War (Rallying Standard) or the off-hand weapon's Ash of War to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance. The Stamina Regeneration Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost stamina recovery and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Nightrider Glaive build
fields.description: The Nightrider Glaive's single-wielding strategy centers on its high Strength scaling, reaching S with a Heavy infusion at +20 upgrade. It has a versatile moveset with chopping R1 attacks and a powerful overhead R2 swing. High Strength investment, maximized through two-handing (requiring 80 Strength for optimal damage), is crucial for damage output. The Shard of Alexander enhances the chosen Ash of War, such as Giant Hunt, which deals high poise damage, or Phantom Slash for damage and roll-catching. Heavy armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability during aggressive engagements. The Axe Talisman boosts charged attacks, and the Godfrey Icon amplifies charged attacks and skills. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Rallying Standard or Bloodboil Aromatic), using standard and charged attacks, and leveraging the chosen Ash of War to stagger enemies and deal heavy damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise damage and charged attacks. The Axe Talisman enhances charged attacks, and the Sacred Scorpion Charm increases Holy attack power. Heavy armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, initiating with the powerful thrusting running R1 attack or sweeping R2 attack, and utilizing the Golden Vow skill to boost damage and defense before engaging in close quarters. The Stamina Regeneration Tear and Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance stamina recovery and holy damage, respectively.

fields.name: Loretta's War Sickle build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for Loretta's War Sickle focuses on its Dex/Int scaling and unique moveset. High Dexterity (50-60) and sufficient Intelligence (20-35) are crucial for maximizing the physical and magic damage, respectively. The unique R1 attacks and the Loretta's Slash skill (boosted by the Shard of Alexander) are key offensive tools. High Vigor and heavy armor ensure survivability. The Ritual Sword Talisman boosts damage when at full health, complementing the weapon's reach. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximize magic and physical damage, respectively. This approach allows for a flexible playstyle, using Loretta's War Sickle for both its melee attacks and ranged skill, and potentially incorporating sorceries or buffs with an off-hand staff or seal, YouTube notes the weapon's versatility.

fields.name: Loretta's War Sickle & Guardian's Swordspear build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy pairs Loretta's War Sickle with another Halberd, such as the Guardian Swordspear (Keen Infused), to maximize damage output through powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman. High Dexterity and Intelligence (for Loretta's Slash) are crucial. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia enhances damage with successive attacks. The Shard of Alexander boosts Loretta's Slash, and the Magic Scorpion Charm amplifies Magic damage. High Endurance (35-40) and heavy armor ensure survivability during aggressive engagements. This strategy involves initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, utilizing Loretta's Slash and the off-hand weapon's skills strategically. The Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear further boost damage. This approach allows for a versatile offense and efficient stance breaking, YouTube notes that Loretta's War Sickle's moveset is good for tracking opponents.

fields.name: Guardian's Swordspear build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Guardian Swordspear emphasizes Dexterity scaling, achieving A with a Keen infusion at +25. This results in higher AR at 99 Dex than even a Quality infusion,. High Dexterity investment (80) maximizes damage. The Lightning Scorpion Charm and Shard of Alexander boost the damage of the chosen Ash of War, like Thunderbolt, which can be easily buffed with Electrify Armament for added Lightning damage. High poise armor (like the Beast Champion Armor) and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs like Golden Vow (if Faith is at 25), engaging with standard and charged attacks, and using the enhanced Ash of War to deal significant damage, especially against enemies weak to Lightning. The Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Thorny Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance damage output. The one-handed moveset, particularly the running thrust and the jump attack into R1 true combo, is very effective.

The Lord of Blood's Exultation ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two Katanas and armor. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Bloodflame Blade, According to YouTube and), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and using the off-hand Ash of War (like Seppuku, According to VG247 and) to maximize bleed buildup and damage. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost successive and charged attack damage, respectively. This approach allows for a highly aggressive and damaging playstyle, particularly effective against enemies susceptible to bleed.

fields.name: Nagakiba build
fields.description: The single-wielding Nagakiba strategy leverages its excellent Dexterity scaling and long reach, which allows for powerful thrusting R2 and charged attacks. Infusing with Keen affinity results in A scaling at +23. High Dexterity (80) maximizes both physical and lightning damage (if using Lightning Slash). The Shard of Alexander and Lightning Scorpion Charm (for Lightning builds) or Lord of Blood's Exultation (for bleed builds) enhance the chosen Ash of War. Heavy armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength, using the Gravel Stone Seal for lightning builds), initiating with Lightning Slash or other chosen Ash of War, and using standard attacks or charged R2s to deal high damage, particularly against staggered enemies. The Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear and Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance Dexterity and Lightning damage, respectively.

fields.name: Nagakiba build
fields.description: The single-wielding Nagakiba strategy leverages its excellent Dexterity scaling and long reach, which allows for powerful thrusting R2 and charged attacks. Heavy armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. The Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear and Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance Dexterity and Lightning damage, respectively.

fields.name: Dual Nagakiba build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Nagakibas or a Nagakiba paired with another suitable Katana like the Uchigatana or Hand of Malenia, to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor. High Dexterity (80) and optional Arcane (45 for bleed builds) are crucial for maximizing the damage and bleed buildup of both Katanas. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. The Lord of Blood's Exultation (for bleed builds) ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two Katanas and armor. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing bleed or lightning damage. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost successive and charged attack damage, respectively. This approach allows for a highly aggressive and damaging playstyle. According to YouTube showcases an ultimate Nagakiba build for NG+7.

fields.name: Nagakiba & Uchigatana build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Nagakibas or a Nagakiba paired with another suitable Katana like the Uchigatana or Hand of Malenia, to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor. fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Nagakibas or a Nagakiba paired with another suitable Katana like the Uchigatana or Hand of Malenia, to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. The Lord of Blood's Exultation (for bleed builds) ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two Katanas and armor.
