The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear further boost successive and charged attack damage, respectively. This approach allows for a highly aggressive and damaging playstyle. According to YouTube showcases an ultimate Nagakiba build for NG+7.

fields.name: Rivers of Blood build
fields.description: The single-wielding Rivers of Blood strategy leverages its high bleed buildup and the powerful Corpse Piler weapon skill. Corpse Piler has a longer range than the Nagakiba or Uchigatana, and it has more bleed buildup and damage, According to YouTube,. Prioritize Arcane over Dexterity for higher damage output and bleed buildup. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman and White Mask maximize damage after triggering bleed. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia enhances damage with successive attacks. The Shard of Alexander boosts the damage of Corpse Piler by 15%, and the Carian Filigreed Crest reduces its FP cost. Heavy armor with high poise and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (using the Dragon Communion Seal in the off-hand), initiating with Corpse Piler to rapidly build up bleed and deal fire damage, and following up with standard attacks while the buff is active. The Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further maximize fire damage and Faith scaling. Note that the damage and bleed buildup of Corpse Piler were decreased in Patch 1.06.

fields.name: Rivers of Blood & Nagakiba build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy uses the Rivers of Blood alongside another Katana like the Nagakiba (infused with Blood affinity, According to YouTube,), to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced attacks and rapid bleed buildup. High Arcane and Dexterity are crucial for maximizing the damage and bleed buildup of both Katanas. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. The Lord of Blood's Exultation ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two Katanas and armor. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (such as Rallying Standard or Bloodboil Aromatic), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using Corpse Piler from the main hand, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing bleed or fire damage. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost successive and charged attack damage, respectively. Note that the poise damage of dual-wield attacks of all Katanas was increased in PvP in Patch 1.13.

fields.name: Rivers of Blood & Uchigatana build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy uses the Rivers of Blood alongside another Katana like the Nagakiba (infused with Blood affinity, According to YouTube,), to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced attacks and rapid bleed buildup. High Arcane and Dexterity are crucial for maximizing the damage and bleed buildup of both Katanas. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. The Lord of Blood's Exultation ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two Katanas and armor. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (such as Rallying Standard or Bloodboil Aromatic), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using Corpse Piler from the main hand, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing bleed or fire damage. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further boost successive and charged attack damage, respectively. Note that the poise damage of dual-wield attacks of all Katanas was increased in PvP in Patch 1.13.

fields.name: Winged Scythe build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Winged Scythe focuses on its Holy damage and Faith scaling, with a C rating at base. High Faith investment (60-80) maximizes both the Holy damage of the weapon and the power of its skill, Angel's Wings, which is unblockable, According to YouTube. The Shard of Alexander and Sacred Scorpion Charm significantly boost the damage of Angel's Wings. High Vigor and medium to heavy armor with the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (using a seal in the off-hand), initiating combat by buffing with Golden Vow (the incantation version is superior) or Blessing of the Erdtree for HP regeneration, and then using the enhanced Angel's Wings skill to deal high Holy damage, especially against staggered enemies. Standard attacks and charged attacks are also used for damage and posture breaking. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance Holy damage and Faith scaling for maximum effectiveness.

fields.name: Winged Scythe & Gargoyle's Black Halberd build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy pairs the Winged Scythe with another Faith-scaling Halberd, such as the Gargoyle's Black Halberd (Sacred Infused) or Golden Halberd, to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks, which are significantly enhanced by the Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor. High Faith investment (60-80) is paramount for maximizing the Holy damage of both Halberds. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage by increasing attack power with successive hits. The Shard of Alexander boosts Angel's Wings, and the Sacred Scorpion Charm amplifies Holy damage. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two Halberds and armor. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (such as Golden Vow or Blessing of the Erdtree), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Angel's Wings skill, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing Holy damage. The Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Faith-Knot Crystal Tear further boost Holy damage and Faith scaling for maximum effectiveness. According to YouTube, dual wielding is an option but might be less effective than using the Winged Scythe as a secondary weapon.

fields.name: Bolt of Gransax build
fields.description: The single-wielding strategy for the Bolt of Gransax leverages its high Dexterity scaling and the powerful Ancient Lightning Spear skill. High Dexterity (80) and Faith (25-30) maximize both the weapon's physical and lightning damage. The Shard of Alexander and Godfrey Icon are essential talismans for boosting the damage of Ancient Lightning Spear, particularly when charged, According to YouTube and Reddit recommends this. Heavy armor and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (using the Gravel Stone Seal in the off-hand), engaging with standard attacks, and utilizing the enhanced Ancient Lightning Spear to deal massive lightning damage and stagger enemies, particularly against dragons, According to YouTube. The Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance lightning damage and Dexterity for maximum effectiveness.

fields.name: Bolt of Gransax & Guardian's Swordspear build
fields.description: The combined approach pairs the Bolt of Gransax with another weapon or shield to create a more versatile build. High Dexterity (80) and Faith (25-30) remain crucial for the effectiveness of Ancient Lightning Spear and Incantations. The Shard of Alexander and Lightning Scorpion Charm are still essential for maximizing skill damage. Pairing the Bolt of Gransax with the Guardian Swordspear or Great Epee (Keen or Lightning Infused) offers strong melee options to complement the ranged attacks. Using a shield like the Erdtree Greatshield provides Holy damage and Holy Retaliation skills, synergizing with the Bolt of Gransax if Holy is infused. Strategic gameplay involves initiating with buffs, using Ancient Lightning Spear for ranged attacks, and switching to the secondary weapon for melee combat or Guard Countering when appropriate, utilizing buffs to further enhance offensive or defensive capabilities. The Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximize damage and sustain depending on the chosen secondary equipment and playstyle. According to YouTube, this approach provides both ranged and melee options.

fields.name: Bolt of Gransax & Erdtree Greatshield build
fields.description: The combined approach pairs the Bolt of Gransax with another weapon or shield to create a more versatile build. High Dexterity (80) and Faith (25-30) remain crucial for the effectiveness of Ancient Lightning Spear and Incantations. The Shard of Alexander and Lightning Scorpion Charm are still essential for maximizing skill damage. Pairing the Bolt of Gransax with the Guardian Swordspear or Great Epee (Keen or Lightning Infused) offers strong melee options to complement the ranged attacks. Using a shield like the Erdtree Greatshield provides Holy damage and Holy Retaliation skills, synergizing with the Bolt of Gransax if Holy is infused. Strategic gameplay involves initiating with buffs, using Ancient Lightning Spear for ranged attacks, and switching to the secondary weapon for melee combat or Guard Countering when appropriate, utilizing buffs to further enhance offensive or defensive capabilities. The Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick maximize damage and sustain depending on the chosen secondary equipment and playstyle. According to YouTube, this approach provides both ranged and melee options.

fields.name: Cross-Naginata build
fields.description: The single-wielding Cross-Naginata strategy focuses on its unique moveset, which blends both thrusting and slashing attacks, providing excellent versatility. Infusing with Keen affinity results in B scaling in Dexterity, while Occult affinity scales bleed buildup with Arcane, Maxroll. High Dexterity (60-80) and optional Arcane investment (45-50) maximize bleed buildup and physical damage. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman and White Mask maximize damage after triggering bleed, while the Spear Talisman enhances thrusting counterattacks, YouTube. The Shard of Alexander boosts the chosen Ash of War. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Bloodflame Blade or Golden Vow), utilizing the chosen Ash of War or powerful heavy attacks, and using the unique moveset to apply bleed and maximize damage. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance successive and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Dual Cross-Naginata build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Cross-Naginatas, or one paired with another spear, to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced jump attacks and rapid bleed buildup, YouTube. High Dexterity (60-80) and Arcane (45-50, if using Occult infusion) are crucial for maximizing the damage and bleed buildup of both weapons. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. The Lord of Blood's Exultation ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two weapons and armor. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Seppuku on the off-hand, YouTube), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing bleed or frostbite damage. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Stonebarb Cracked Tear further boost successive and poise damage, respectively.

fields.name: Pike build
fields.description: The single-wielding Pike strategy focuses on its exceptional reach, which allows for powerful thrusting attacks and safe counter-attacking. Infusing with Heavy affinity with high Strength, or Quality for balanced scaling, provides strong physical damage. Occult infusion with high Arcane can add significant damage and bleed buildup. The Spear Talisman enhances counterattack damage, capitalizing on the Pike's moveset. The Shard of Alexander and Godfrey Icon boost the chosen Ash of War. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, utilizing the weapon's reach to poke enemies from a distance, using the Ash of War to deal heavy damage and stagger, and leveraging counterattacks when enemies commit to an attack. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Dual Pike build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy with two Pikes or a Pike paired with another spear capitalizes on powerstanced jump attacks and rapid thrusting attacks. High Strength, Dexterity, or Arcane investment (depending on infusion) is crucial for maximizing the damage of both weapons. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. The Lord of Blood's Exultation ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed (if using Blood or Occult infusions). Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Stonebarb Cracked Tear further boost successive and poise damage, respectively. This approach allows for a highly aggressive and damaging playstyle, especially against enemies that can be staggered easily.

fields.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword build
fields.description: The single-wielding Lordsworn's Straight Sword strategy capitalizes on its high critical rating and versatility. Infusing with a Quality affinity provides balanced Strength and Dexterity scaling, resulting in high physical damage. The default Square Off skill is excellent for staggering enemies for a critical hit, and its high posture damage is especially useful against larger opponents. Using a shield with Barricade Shield allows for powerful Guard Counters, which can also lead to critical hits. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, utilizing the weapon's balanced moveset, using Square Off or another chosen Ash of War to stagger enemies, and following up with critical hits to maximize damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Broadsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding Broadsword strategy capitalizes on its high Heavy scaling and strong physical damage output. The default Square Off skill is excellent for staggering enemies for a critical hit, and its high posture damage is especially useful against larger opponents. Its one-handed moveset consists of horizontal slashes, providing a wide area of attack. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength), utilizing the weapon's moveset, using Square Off or another chosen Ash of War to stagger enemies, and following up with strong attacks to maximize damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Longsword build
fields.description: The single-wielding Longsword strategy capitalizes on its versatility, standard moveset, and powerful Ash of War, Square Off, which is excellent for staggering enemies and setting up critical hits, YouTube. A Quality build with 40-50 in Strength and Dexterity provides balanced scaling and decent physical damage. The Dagger Talisman and Godfrey Icon further boost critical and charged attack damage, respectively. Using a shield with Barricade Shield allows for powerful Guard Counters, which can also lead to critical hits. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, utilizing the weapon's moveset, using Square Off to stagger enemies, and following up with critical hits to maximize damage. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

fields.name: Dual Longsword build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Longswords or one paired with another Straight Sword to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced jump attacks and rapid combos. High Strength and Dexterity (40-50 in each for Quality infusion) or Intelligence/Faith/Arcane (for elemental or status builds) are crucial for maximizing the damage of both weapons. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Stonebarb Cracked Tear further boost successive and poise damage, respectively. YouTube, shows that the Longsword is excellent for dual-wielding status builds due to its fast attacks.

fields.name: Sword of Night and Flame build
fields.description: The Sword of Night and Flame is a versatile and powerful weapon for Intelligence/Faith builds. Its Night-and-Flame Stance offers both ranged and AoE attacks, making it adaptable to various combat situations. High investment in Intelligence and Faith, combined with complementary talismans and buffs, maximizes its potential for devastating damage. Strategic use of its skills and careful resource management are key to success.

fields.name: Godskin Peeler build
fields.description: The single-wielding Godskin Peeler strategy relies on its dexterity scaling, reach, and rapid attacks. Infusing with Keen affinity with high Dexterity (60-80) provides strong physical damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Twinblade Talisman reward successive hits, working well with the Godskin Peeler's attack speed. The Shard of Alexander boosts the chosen Ash of War. The gameplay involves applying buffs, utilizing the weapon's moveset, especially the fast combos from skills like Double Slash, and using the Ash of War to deal heavy damage and stagger, particularly with the Black Flame Tornado skill against large enemies.

fields.name: Dual Godskin Peeler build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy uses two Godskin Peelers or one paired with Eleonora's Poleblade to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced jump attacks and rapid combos. High Arcane (45-50) and Dexterity (45-50) are crucial for maximizing the bleed buildup of both weapons when infused with Occult or Blood affinities. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Lord of Blood's Exultation and White Mask provide a large damage boost after triggering bleed. Gameplay involves applying buffs (including Seppuku on both weapons), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and utilizing skills like Corpse Piler (on Eleonora's Poleblade) to capitalize on openings and bleed enemies to death.

fields.name: Eleonora's Poleblade build
fields.description: The single-wielding Eleonora's Poleblade strategy centers on its high bleed and fire damage potential, particularly from the Bloodblade Dance weapon skill. The weapon's moveset, which includes a fast and unique R2 attack that spins multiple times, makes it excellent for consecutive hits, triggering bonus damage from talismans like the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Thorny Cracked Tear, Elden Ring Wiki. High investment in Arcane and Dexterity maximizes bleed buildup and fire damage output. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman and White Mask provide a large damage boost after triggering bleed, which happens frequently with Bloodblade Dance. The Shard of Alexander further enhances the skill's damage, while the Carian Filigreed Crest manages its FP cost. High Vigor and Faith (for Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength) ensure survivability and additional damage. This approach is effective against bosses and single targets, where you can safely use Bloodblade Dance to shred their health and posture.

fields.name: Dual Eleonora's Poleblade build
fields.description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Eleonora's Poleblades or one paired with another twinblade to maximize powerstanced jump attacks and consecutive hits. This approach is highly aggressive and effective against most enemies and bosses. The combination of the Claw Talisman, Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor, and a high Arcane stat (45-50) makes jump attacks incredibly powerful, especially with the bonus bleed buildup from the second weapon. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Lord of Blood's Exultation further amplify damage during rapid attack chains and after triggering bleed. The White Mask and Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear also enhance damage output. While dual-wielding sacrifices the use of the main hand's Ash of War for a normal attack, the combined damage and bleed buildup from two weapons, particularly during powerstanced jump attacks, more than compensate. The Bloodblade Dance skill from the main hand remains a valuable tool for burst damage and evasive maneuvers, offering a versatile and devastating offensive playstyle. This build thrives on constant pressure and rapid status effect application, making it a fast-paced and high-damage option for PvE, though it may be more susceptible to punishment if not executed carefully in PvP. The main advantage of this strategy lies in its ability to quickly apply bleed to enemies, which can stagger them and open them up for critical hits. The high number of hits from powerstanced attacks combined with the bleed effect and fire damage makes this build very effective against bosses that are susceptible to bleed and can be staggered easily. The playstyle is fast-paced, requiring players to constantly pressure their opponents and manage their stamina effectively. Although this build is very strong in PvE, it may be less effective in PvP due to the risk of being punished for aggressive play and the potential for opponents to avoid the rapid attacks.

fields.name: Hoslow's Petal
fields.description: The single-wielding Hoslow's Petal Whip strategy focuses on high bleed buildup and its fast and wide attack arcs, making it excellent for applying status effects and controlling groups of enemies, YouTube. Infusing with Occult affinity with high Arcane (60-80) provides the highest damage and bleed buildup, outperforming Blood infusion, Reddit. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman and White Mask provide a large damage boost after triggering bleed, which happens frequently with the whip's rapid attacks. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Bloodflame Blade or Golden Vow), utilizing the weapon's reach to keep enemies at a distance, and using the Ash of War to deal with specific situations (e.g., Kick against shields, Bloodhound's Step for evasion). The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance successive and charged attack damage, respectively. This build is particularly effective in PvP due to the whip's unparriable nature and its ability to catch enemies who are trying to roll away, YouTube.

fields.name: Urumi build
fields.description: The single-wielding Urumi strategy capitalizes on its exceptional Dexterity scaling (S with Keen infusion), unique charged R2 moveset, and long reach. This build focuses on maximizing the Urumi's physical damage, which is boosted by high Dexterity investment (80). The charged heavy attack is a key component, allowing for a heavy attack into light attack combo that rewards successive attack talismans like Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Millicent's Prosthesis, YouTube. Using Royal Knight's Resolve on the Urumi and pairing it with the Axe Talisman and Spiked Cracked Tear can lead to massive burst damage from a charged R2, which can be further amplified by the piercing damage bonus from the Spear Talisman (as the R2 thrust deals pierce damage), YouTube. This approach is highly effective in PvP due to the Urumi's deceptive range and the difficulty opponents have in predicting the charged R2 attack, Reddit. Endure can also be used to absorb hits during the charged attack windup, allowing you to tank through attacks and land the devastating combo, YouTube.
